leadingComments.value:
*
	 * Constructs a new mask pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Scene} scene - The scene to render.
	 * @param {Camera} camera - The camera to use.

trailingComments.value:
*
	 * Creates a stencil bit mask.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} readBuffer - The read buffer.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} writeBuffer - The write buffer.
Draw the mask into both buffers.

leadingComments.value: Draw the mask into both buffers.

trailingComments.value: Only render where the stencil is set to 1.
